languages.text: {n}Ториана Гапрак выглядит довольно встревоженно. Тощий Зауэрбэк, одетый удивительно лаконично и строго для аристократа столь высокого ранга, подозрительно хмурится. На раут он явился со спутницей — женщиной ослепительной красоты, чье горло охватывает позолоченное колье-{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g}. Вероятно, это его жена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ториана Гапрак выглядит довольно встревоженно. Тощий Зауэрбек, одетый удивительно лаконично и строго для аристократа столь высокого ранга, подозрительно хмурится. На раут он явился со спутницей — женщиной ослепительной красоты, чье горло охватывает позолоченное колье-аугмент. Вероятно, это его жена.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

На раут он явился со спутницей — женщиной ослепительной красоты, чье горло охватывает позолоченное колье-{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g}. Вероятно, это его жена.{/n}

He came to the rout with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty with a gilded necklace augment around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

languages.text: {n}トリアーナ・ギャプラックはかなり不安げだ。意外なことに、高位の貴族にしては質素で飾り気のない衣装をまとったマハリウス・ザウアーバックは、怪訝な表情をしている。マハリウスが祝賀会に連れてきた人物――目もくらむような美しさの女性は、首元で金色に輝く{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーギュメント{/g}のネックレスをつけている。おそらくマハリウスの妻だろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナ・ギャプラックはかなり不安げだ。意外なことに、高位の貴族にしては質素で飾り気のない衣装をまとったマハリウス・ザウアーバックは、怪訝な表情をしている。マハリウスが祝賀会に連れてきた人物――目もくらむような美しさの女性は、首元で金色に輝く{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーギュメント{/g}のネックレスをつけている。おそらくマハリウスの妻だろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜·贾帕克看起来相当焦虑。而马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克，身为如此尊贵的贵族，穿着却出奇地朴素。他此刻正皱着眉头，满脸狐疑。他带着他的女伴一起参加了这场聚会。他的女伴美得令人目眩，脖子上戴着一条镀金{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}项链，或许是马卡里乌斯的妻子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜·贾帕克看起来相当焦虑。而马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克，身为如此尊贵的贵族，穿着却出奇地朴素。他此刻正皱着眉头，满脸狐疑。他带着他的女伴一起参加了这场聚会。他的女伴美得令人目眩，脖子上戴着一条镀金{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}项链，或许是马卡里乌斯的妻子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak parece bastante nerviosa. Macharius Sauerback, vestido de manera sorprendentemente sencilla y sobria para un aristócrata de tan alto rango, frunce el ceño con suspicacia. Llegó a la recepción con una acompañante, una mujer de deslumbrante belleza que portaba un collar de {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumento{/g} dorado. Probablemente se tratara de su esposa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak parece bastante nerviosa. Macharius Sauerback, vestido de manera sorprendentemente sencilla y sobria para un aristócrata de tan alto rango, frunce el ceño con suspicacia. Llegó a la recepción con una acompañante, una mujer de deslumbrante belleza que portaba un collar de {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumento{/g} dorado. Probablemente se tratara de su esposa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak a l'air plutôt anxieuse. Macharius Sauerback, vêtu d'une tenue étrangement simple et austère pour un aristocrate de son rang, manifeste sa méfiance par un froncement de sourcils prononcé. Il est accompagné d'une femme d'une indéniable beauté dont le cou gracieux est encerclé par une {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} taillée en forme de collier. Il s'agit probablement de sa femme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak a l'air plutôt anxieuse. Macharius Sauerback, vêtu d'une tenue étrangement simple et austère pour un aristocrate de son rang, manifeste sa méfiance par un froncement de sourcils prononcé. Il est accompagné d'une femme d'une indéniable beauté dont le cou gracieux est encerclé par une {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} taillée en forme de collier. Il s'agit probablement de sa femme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak wirkt ziemlich nervös. Macharius Sauerback, für einen Aristokraten seines Ranges überraschend einfach und schmucklos gekleidet, blickt verdächtig finster drein. Er kam mit einer Begleiterin zu dem Empfang – einer strahlenden Schönheit mit einer goldenen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} um die Kehle. Wahrscheinlich seine Frau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak wirkt ziemlich nervös. Macharius Sauerback, für einen Aristokraten seines Ranges überraschend einfach und schmucklos gekleidet, blickt verdächtig finster drein. Er kam mit einer Begleiterin zu dem Empfang – einer strahlenden Schönheit mit einer goldenen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g} um die Kehle. Wahrscheinlich seine Frau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak epey kaygılı duruyor. Oldukça üst düzey bir aristokrat olmasına rağmen şaşırtıcı derecede sade ve gösterişsiz giyinmiş olan Macharius Sauerback, şüpheyle surat asıyor. Macharius, merasime birisiyle gelmiş: Gerdanında yaldızlı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g} kolyesi takan, göz alıcı derecede güzel bir kadın. Muhtemelen karısı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak looks rather anxious. Macharius Sauerback, dressed surprisingly plainly and austerely for an aristocrat of such a high rank, is frowning suspiciously. He came to the reception with a companion — a woman of dazzling beauty wearing a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augment{/g} necklace around her throat. His wife, probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak epey kaygılı duruyor. Böylesine üst düzey bir aristokrat olmasına rağmen şaşırtıcı derecede sade ve gösterişsiz bir şekilde giyinmiş olan Macharius Sauerback, şüpheyle surat asıyor. Macharius, resepsiyona yanında birisini getirmiş: Gerdanında yaldızlı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g} kolyesi takan, göz alıcı derecede güzel bir kadın. Muhtemelen karısı.{/n}
